DOC.brief_summary: The study investigate rapid immunization regime Japanese Encephalitis vaccine IC51 ( JE-PIV ) healthy subject age > = 18 year
DOC.brief_title: Rapid Immunization Study Japanese Encephalitis Vaccine IC51
DOC.detailed_description: This multicenter , observer blind , control , randomize phase 3 study . The study population consist healthy male female volunteer , age least 18 year . Approximately 375 volunteer enrol approximately 2 3 site .
DOC.criteria: At least 18 year age Written inform consent obtain prior study entry History clinical manifestation flavivirus infection History vaccination Japanese encephalitis ( JE ) , Yellow fever Dengue fever ( antiJEV neutralize antibody titer > = 1:10 baseline acceptable inclusion , subject part safety population , analyze immunogenicity perprotocol analysis ) Use investigational nonregistered drug vaccine addition study vaccine study period within 30 day precede first dose study vaccine Immunodeficiency include postorgantransplantation immunosuppressive therapy A family history congenital hereditary immunodeficiency History autoimmune disease Any acute infection within 4 week prior enrollment Infection HIV , Hepatitis B Hepatitis C Pregnancy , lactation unreliable contraception female subject
